about_the_game:
Mikey and Grover's Unexpected Adventure is a point and click adventure, featuring retro hand drawn pixel art and animations.


Mikey is an ordinary kid who enjoys a good snack and really hates spiders. But above all else, he loves guitars!



On his 12th birthday Mikey wished for his dream guitar, the Bender SG200.
But alas, Mikey’s wish did not come to pass.



So, when Mikey learns from his uncle Chuck about the tales of hidden treasures in the lighthouse, he makes the responsible decision and drags his best bud Grover on a hunt for that long lost treasure.

Mikey will hear many different stories about the lighthouse, some of them are absolutely bananas. Or, are they?

The boys don’t really know what they’ll find over there, anything is possible, but they are ready and they are brave... No. That’s a very strong word... They are fearless... Wait, no, that’s not it either... They’ll somehow, with a little bit of luck, make it through a bunch of unexpected adventures.


Talk to town's peoples and learn all about the tales of the lighthouse. Gather items, solve puzzles and make your way to that treasure!

The full story will be set in 6 parts. The demo features part 1.

The game is suitable for all ages and contains no foul language or violence.

short_description: Mikey and Grover go on a treasure hunt in a mysterious ancient lighthouse. It seems that everyone in town has a different theory about what is hidden in the lighthouse. The boys don't know what they'll find there, anything is possible. Join them as they embark on a bunch of unexpected adventures!
